message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $14000. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $14000 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $13000 for the product. Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I can see you're a serious buyer, so I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can offer it to you for $13500. What do you think?
